name: Scarlet Tower [DEMO]
description:
Scarlet Tower

Hunt during the day, be hunted during the NIGHT! Scarlet Tower is a gothic horror casual game with roguelike and RPG elements, like talent trees, classes, familiars and more!




Day & Night Cycle
Look for relics and vendors that only spawn at night.

Weather Events
Be prepared!




More Features
- Characters with unique customizable passives.
- Procedural Map Generation
- 7 Characters with exclusive passives
- Support Widescreen Resolution

Buy The Full Version on Steam!

Full version will feature more upgrades, characters, weapons,  and enemies!

Controls
WASD - Move
Shift/Space - Dash

Enjoy it!
